sense.name: make a remark or express opinion
sense.examples: My mom never fails to comment on what I'm wearing. He commented that the two essays were rather similar. The officer refused to comment on the matter. "It will rain," commented the woman. The woman commented "it will rain."

sense.name: make a critical observation
sense.examples: The film comments on the materialism of modern society. Such observations comment on the quality of modern life.

sense.name: provide interlinear explanations, annotate
sense.examples: (Computer Science) Please comment your source code. The book was meticulously commented. The running commentary filled every margin.

sense.name: COMPUTER SCI-hide from compiler
sense.commentary: To surround a section of code with comment delimiters. This prevents it from being compiled or interpreted.
sense.examples: If that's giving you trouble, just comment out the lines. How do you comment a line in Java?
